Name: Mercantilism
Description: Shops always accept your Gold for trade.

Name: Wealth
Description: Each Noble adventurer of your group also counts as 1 Gem.

Name: Stultify
Description: Enemy loses 1 fame for each item he has.

Name: Eykjagerfi
Description: Mounts are also considered as Weapons.

Name: Saga
Description: You can’t have more than 3 adventurers, but you may do 3 actions per turn (Exploring, Camping, Attacking).

Name: Lagom
Description: +1 attack per single-type adventurer in your group.

Name: Marriage
Description: Marry two adventurers together. Anything that happen to one will also happen to the other from now on.

Name: Wedding party
Description: 'The two adventurers marry, becoming a couple. The newly created coupe is considered as 1 unit and have the sum of the two adventurers'' attributes, but only one talent. All skills are transfered.'

Name: Epopee
Description: Your journey is an epopee! Your adventurers are heroes! Whenever one of these heroes die, gain 1 fame.

Name: Harem
Description: +1 fame per female in your group. Females can also use Slave type skills.

Name: Slavery
Description: Slaves can be used as any resources and traded.

Name: Encomienda
Description: All adventurers in your group are also considered Spanish.

Name: Festival
Description: When camping at night, you may organize a Festival.  Consuming food is worth triple, but you must pay 1 Gold per food consumed.

Name: Fear
Description: The targeted unit is feared. It becomes peaceful.

Name: Ambition
Description: +1 Group Class level while this skill is active.

Name: Glory
Description: Whenever you earn fame, get 1 additional fame.

Name: Hubris
Description: Consume your religion to double the HP and ATK of your group leader. You can�t get a new religion and can�t change group leader as long as your group leader lives.

Name: Weltanschauung
Description: Your map can contain 10 more cards. This skill must be attached to your Group Class at the beginning of this game.

Name: Art de Vivre
Description: When camping during the Day, generate 1 Gold per Non-fighting adventurer of your group.

Name: Panache
Description: Your attack are never Effective, but the damage can’t be prevented.

Name: Bonne entente
Description: Double your Cultural Range.

Name: Integration
Description: Change the nationality of the targeted unit into the major one in your group

Name: Ukase
Description: While this skill is Exhausted, you may use two times any Soldier skill.  This skill is refreshed when you discover a Russian adventurer.

Name: Orangism
Description: Your group class is always level 3.

Name: Conquest
Description: Conquest the whole region. All encountered adventurer will be aggressive, but you gain 2 attack in that region.

Name: War
Description: Deal 3 damage +1 damage per Noble adventurer in your group.

Name: Corporal punishment
Description: Punish the targeted unit. The caster attacks the unit, which increases you hand size by 1.

Name: Angabhoga
Description: Regenerate 1 HP per Indian in your group.

Name: Volksgeist
Description: For each German or Swede in your group, your attacks deal +1 damage.

Name: Native study
Description: Gain 1 knowledge when you discover an adventure of Unknown, African, or Native culture.

Name: Linguistics
Description: +1 knowledge for each group member with a different origin.

Name: Colonize
Description: Removes the Regions’ structure limit.

Name: Colonial education
Description: Educate the captured Native and transform him into an adventurer of your choice.

Name: Advanced diplomacy
Description: Education grants two times more Diplomacy.

Name: Revendication
Description: Revendicate the current region. All adventurers will be aggressive.

Name: Inspiration
Description: You can follow an additional quest.

Name: Witenagemot
Description: When you are attacked, you may Exhaust X Intellectual skill. Each Intellectual skills exhausted this way prevent 1 damage of this attack.

Name: Kill
Description: Spend 1 fame, kill the targeted adventurer.

Name: Zeal
Description: Adventurers who have 0 ATK can use Soldier skills.

Name: Caudillismo
Description: Male adventurers get +1 STR.

Name: Fasting
Description: Draw a additional skill card at the beginning oof your turn, but can�t gain any food during this turn.

Name: Wondering
Description: Step back and wonder at the world. You can convert X knowledge into food, where X is your amount of knowedge.

Name: Wander
Description: Explore 1, you can reroll this dice as many times as your amount of Skill cards in your hand.

Name: Communication skills
Description: -1 enemy damage.

Name: Diarchy
Description: Nominate the attached adventurer as a second group leader.

Name: Inspire
Description: Using this skill allows you to use any other skill for free.

Name: Accolade
Description: Makes a Soldier a knight, thus granting him the Noble type.

Name: Execution
Description: Spend 1 knowledge, execute the targeted adventurer.

Name: Hook shield
Description: Remove 1 Miss card when attacking a Melee enemy, and replace the Critical Strike card with a Hit card.

Name: Bravery
Description: Attacking a unit with more ATK than the skill caster will add +3 damage to your attack.

Name: Empfindsamkeit
Description: When you discover a Legendary card, refresh all your group.

Name: Pensato
Description: Use another active skill, but don’t apply its effects.

Name: Pacifism
Description: You can�t attack. But you can reroll of your dices when you explore.

Name: Pilgrimage
Description: Change the current region for a previous one. Gain 1 fame.

Name: Khalsa
Description: Comes with Sikhism. Attack bonuses from items attached to this adventurer are doubled.

Name: Perception
Description: You can reroll 1 of the exploration dices (before you draw)

Name: Pantisocracy
Description: All your adventurers can use Noble skills, but Noble skills take to 2 Skill slots.

Name: Leadership
Description: Increases maximum group members by 1.

Name: Loyalty
Description: Deal 1 damage per other non-noble adventurer in your group.

Name: Sonkei
Description: While this skill is active, your group leader must be Japanese. Noble skills can be used with any resource.

Name: Deflect
Description: When being hit by a ranged critical strike, deals 1 damage to the attacker.

Name: Camaraderie
Description: +1 hand size per soldier in your group.

Name: Close combat
Description: Deal 4 damage.

Name: Castrametation
Description: You are more efficient at laying out camp.

Name: Invidia
Description: Choose your most expensive card, and look at a number of any hidden card corresponding to the price of the chosen card. Discard that card.

Name: Mantra
Description: Whenever you use a Religious skill, you may use a second one for free.

Name: Briefadel
Description: Add the Noble type to the selected adventurer.

Name: Promote
Description: Grants a permanent +1/+1 to the targeted unit if it has less ATK than your group leader.

Name: Bayonet
Description: Deals damage equal to casters’s ATK to each enemy melee units.

Name: Coup de crosse
Description: Your next attack is considered melee instead of gunpowder.

Name: Propitiation
Description: Spend all your action points to draw as many skills as you are missing HP.

Name: Severance
Description: Move the selected adventurer from its original region to another.

Name: Caracole
Description: Deals 2 damage per Mounted adventurer in your group.

Name: Highland Charge
Description: Use before Charging the enemy. Enemy will take double damage from your side, but you will suffer two times more damage as well.

Name: Strength
Description: Skill deal +1 damage.

Name: Grand Tour
Description: Get a Cicerone adventurer that accompany your group.

Name: Brawl
Description: Engage in a brawl. All unit involved in the fight have the single unarmed specialty until the fight ends.

Name: Polearm mastery
Description: Something.

Name: Archaic combat
Description: You can spend 1 fame per adventurer to double the damage of Melee or Archer adventurers of you group when they attack.

Name: Swordsmanship
Description: Sword wielders get +1 attack.

Name: Oberhau
Description: Perform a 2 Critical Strike, 1 Miss attack, and exhaust this adventurer. Inflicts 1 damage to this adventurer and Fear to the enemy if Miss.

Name: Javanmardi
Description: You attacks are always effective as long as the enemy has more attack bonus than your group.

Name: Preach
Description: Turn an aggressive unit into a peaceful unit.

Name: Advanced formation
Description: +1 attack per Soldier of the same primary attack type.

Name: Military tactics
Description: When your group leader is a Soldier, gain +2 attack per Soldier in your group.

Name: Weaponry
Description: Units can use any types of weapon regardless of specialties.

Name: Heresy
Description: Deals 3 damage to a non-religious unit, or if it is a Religious adventurer, kills it instead.

Name: Excommunicate
Description: Remove the selected adventurer from your group, and put it in the discovery bank.

Name: Condemn
Description: Deal X damage to the enemy, where X is ATK.

Name: Convert
Description: Convert targeted unit to the caster�s religion.

Name: Requisition
Description: Draw 2 cards from your opponent’s map and shuffle them into your map.

Name: Holify
Description: Targeted nature, item, or landmark card becomes holy. Its presence regenerates 1 HP per turn.

Name: Baptise
Description: Baptise the targeted adventurer, who becomes blessed by God. Heals 1 HP.

Name: Chrysopoeia
Description: Convert a Normal card into 1 Gold, a Rare card into 2 Gold, or a Legendary card into 3 Gold.

Name: Stampede
Description: Deal 5 damage.

Name: Stomp
Description: Stomps and deals 1 damage per hoofed units.

Name: Advanced training
Description: Next turn, you’ll start camping for 2 consecutive turns. Permanently increases your attack by the number of Soldiers you have in your group. Discard this card.

Name: Apostasy
Description: The Adventurer with the most damage in your group becomes an Apostate. He has all types, but can not use Active skill nor attack/counterattack. Additionally, his talent is desactivated.

Name: Anthem
Description: An Anthem is played everytime you have inflicted more damage than suffered during an attack. Heals an amount equal to that difference.

Name: Gold fire
Description: Spend 1 gold. Deal damage equal to your amount of gold.

Name: Explosive item
Description: Targets an item belonging to an enemy. The item explodes and deal damage equal to its gold cost.

Name: Magnificenza
Description: All your building are Magnificent. You may exhaust them to pay 1 Gold or to gain 1 Knowledge. Exhausted buildings are Refreshed at the beginning of your next turn.

Name: Cavalry charge
Description: Charges the enemy, dealing the ATK of of mounted adventurers in your group.

Name: Mercenarism
Description: Pay X gold, this unit will gain X attack this turn.

Name: Oseledets
Description: Adopt the shaved cut of the real Cossacks. Non-Slavic enemies are affected with Fear after attacking the wielding adventurer.

Name: Verbounko
Description: Discard a card or take 1 damage. Soldiers have +1 Attack.

Name: Apotheosis
Description: Make a God out of one of your adventurer. His presence is now a religion, as long as he lives. At his death, he remains in a group as a religion card and its talent continues to take effect.

Name: House of God
Description: Build a chapel.

Name: Canonization
Description: The targeted dead adventurer becomes a Saint. His Talent will stay active for the group. Only 1 saint per group.

Name: Hymn
Description: Chant the hymn of your group. All your adventurer gain +1 ATK this turn.

Name: Pray
Description: Throw a dice. Regenerate HP given the result. If 6, suffer 6 damage.

Name: Find gold
Description: Throw X dices, where is your Fame. Gain 2 gold for each same number you roll.

Name: Falun Knack
Description: When you discover a Plain or a Mountain, you may search for 1 Resource card.

Name: Excavation
Description: Excavate the targeted structure.

Name: Advanced building
Description: Maximum buildable structures is increased by 1.

Name: Mount affinity
Description: Mounts have +1 speed bonus.

Name: Shi’uchi
Description: Mounts have +1 speed bonus.

Name: Zeúgnumi
Description: All animal can be mounted.

Name: Protect
Description: When you receive damage, reduce this amount by 1.

Name: Devotion
Description: When you have only 1 religion, +2 hand size.

Name: Holy war
Description: Deal 2 damage per Religious in your group.

Name: Ceremony
Description: For 1 gold, 1 food, 1 knowledge, organise a ceremony. Change all your skill cards for new ones.

Name: Memorabilia
Description: Whenever you draw an event, you may attach 1 item to this skill. Items attached are not counted as item nor enabled, but when you discover an event,you can discard an attached item to double the effects of that event once.

Name: Ichnology
Description: When you discover an Animal, you may search for an Animal from your Discovery pile. Doing so generates 1 Knowledge.

Name: Archaeology
Description: Search the targeted structure. Spend X food, draw X items. Discard the structure.

Name: Mining
Description: While in mountains, get 1 gold per turn you don�t fight.

Name: Toolmaking
Description: Pay 1 Gold, search for 1 Equipment.

Name: Hone
Description: +1 hand size per Skills with restriction in your group.

Name: Confucianism
Description: Intellectual skills can be used for any resource. Is considered a religion by your group, but not by other groups.

Name: Stand watch
Description: You may defend with any Specialty.

Name: Battue nocturne
Description: At Night, remove all terrain defensive effects for the enemy team. Search for X animals, where X is your attack bonus.

Name: Triangulation
Description: When you discover 3 locations cards, gain 2 knowledge.

Name: Scientific exploration
Description: Discover 2 nature cards and 2 locations cards. You may discard any.

Name: Schuttersgilde
Description: Dutch adventurers can learn Soldier skills.

Name: Compagnonnage
Description: Commoners can have as many skills as you have Commoners in your group.

Name: Artisanship
Description: Crafting recipes require one less components.

Name: Administration
Description: When spending a resource, that resource has a +1 bonus.

Name: Cartography
Description: Invert your Speed with your Cultural Range.

Name: Auspiciousness
Description: You may reroll 1 time any time you roll a dice this turn.

Name: Star reading
Description: +1 speed.

Name: Astronomy
Description: Look at the stars, and predict the future. Look at the next 3 events, and put them back at the top of their library in the order of your choice.

Name: Mathematics
Description: 'Whenever you see an event, a discovery, or a skill card with an ''X'' in its effect, gain 1 knowledge.'

Name: Engineering
Description: +1 attack for each Intellectual in your group.

Name: Advanced trade
Description: Anything from Shops costs

Name: Wickerwork
Description: If you have more Spice than Food, then grants that difference as bonus Food.

Name: Stunt
Description: Lose 1 food and nullify the effect of the targeted event.  Or gain 1 fame but draw an additional event.

Name: Contrapposto
Description: Your exhausted Noble or Slave adventurers count as Knowledge.

Name: Walking mastery
Description: Minimum Speed for Unmounted Adventurers is set to 2.

Name: Fartlek
Description: Whenever your speed changes, you gain 1 speed for the day.

Name: Ledger keeping
Description: When you discover an event, you might change it for any event from the discard pile for 1 knowledge.

Name: Inventory mastery
Description: Your adventurers can carry an additional artefact.

Name: Pathfinding
Description: Draw 2 locations.

Name: Cartomancy
Description: When you discover a Normal card, you may Explore 1.  A Rare card, Refresh 1.  A Legendary card, Search for a Legendary card from your map.

Name: Soumak tapestry
Description: Your adventurers get +X Inventory slots, where X is your Spice/2 (rounded down).

Name: Weaving
Description: Armors provides 2 times more defense.

Name: Advanced gunpowder
Description: Each Gunpowder unit gets +1 attack, but are locked to that attack type.

Name: Sharpshooter attack
Description: 'Fires a single shot that deals doubled caster''s ATK.'

Name: Reconnaissance
Description: For X food, explore X*2 and look at these cards. Put them back at the top of their libraries.

Name: Fast exploration
Description: Explore 2, look at them. You may discover it or put it back to the top of its library.

Name: Deep exploration
Description: You can reroll up to all your exploration dices after throwing them.

Name: Incursion
Description: Explore X where X is your ATK.

Name: Padrão
Description: Comes with Padrão.  Erect a Padrão. When you change region, you may take the Padrão too.

Name: Memorable achievement
Description: That was a moment worth keeping the memory of!  Gain 1 fame, discard any resource.

Name: Paganism
Description: Paganism religion.

Name: Totemancy
Description: Summons a Totem. Totem is an equipment item that can carry an artifact or a passive skill, with its full effects.

Name: Resource conversion
Description: Resources that have the same quantity are interchangeable (they are considered either or both).

Name: Impaling arrow
Description: Deals 2 damage, +1 damage per bow in your group.

Name: Point blank
Description: This ranged unit’s attacks are considered melee.

Name: Forced walk
Description: +5 speed this turn.

Name: Effective campement
Description: Camp now.

Name: Sacrifice
Description: Slaughter a unit from your group. Gain 1 food, draw 1 skill, and 1 event.

Name: Puri Puri
Description: If you have Paganism, you can consume Adventurers as food. If not, you can consume Religious skill.

Name: Vodou
Description: Search for an Adventurer. You may attach this adventurer as a passive or active General skill depending of his talent.

Name: Peasants rampage
Description: Deal 1 damage per Commoner in your group.

Name: Rake hit
Description: Give a strong hit with a rake, shovel or pickaxe. Deals 3 damage.

Name: Cultivate
Description: Generates X food after you leave a plain, where Xis the region’s size.

Name: Deforest
Description: While in a forest, exhaust all your Adventurers and generate 1 Gold per exhausted adventurer.  You can’t build more structure in the region.  Animals discovered in the region are sent to the Damage pile instead.

Name: Gather resources
Description: Gather resources in the area.  +X gold where X is the size of the region. Only once per region.

Name: Volley
Description: Deals 1 damage per Archery or Gundpowder unit in your group.

Name: Strafe
Description: Deals 1 per enemy unit to all enemy units.

Name: Endurance
Description: After a fight ends, adventurers of your group gain +1 max HP.

Name: Fast transport
Description: +1 speed per Commoner in your group.

Name: Road making
Description: +1 Speed per Region discovered.

Name: Logistic
Description: Your speed is not affected by

Name: Cannibalism
Description: Gain 1 food from the corpse of a recently dead adventurer.

Name: Servitude
Description: +1 hand size.

Name: Taxonomy
Description: Each time you meet a new animal or plant, get +1 knowledge.

Name: Cooking
Description: Exhaust 1 Region, heals X where X is the Region’s Food.

Name: Quick shot
Description: Use at the end of an attack, if this adventurer hasn’t attacked yet, deals 1 damage to the target.

Name: Evasion
Description: You can have a chance to evade an attack.  Throw a dice, if [1-3], evade the attack.

Name: Sprezzatura
Description: The absolute difference between the number of cards in your hand and your opponent’s hand is counted as Knowledge.

Name: Scavenge
Description: Discard any skill. Throw a dice,  [1-2] gain 1 food  [3-4] gain 1 gold  [5-6] Discover an item

Name: Herbalism
Description: You can combine 2 plants into 1 food.

Name: Heal
Description: Regenerate 1 HP.

Name: Skin
Description: Target an animal. Gain 1 Gold and Heal 2.  Put the animal in the damage pile.

Name: Fishing
Description: Fish in a water area to find food.

Name: Poison shot
Description: You attack are venomous. They deal 1 additional damage per turn.

Name: Bowmanship
Description: Adventurers in your group have an additional Archery Skill slot.

Name: Marksmanship
Description: Archery and Gunpowder skills deal +1 damage.

Name: Sniping shot
Description: Deals 3 damage.

Name: Furtivity
Description: Your group can�t be seen by enemies until you attack them or use a skill at them.

Name: Ambuscade
Description: Starts an Ambush, but doesn’t put you in Raid. Can be used in any region terrains.

Name: Entertainment
Description: Let's have fun!

Name: Prostitution
Description: Engage in sexual activity with any unit. Gain X gold where X is the recruitment cost of that unit. Lose 1 HP in the process.

Name: Vogelfrei
Description: All German adventurers have 1 additional Inventory Slot.  +1 Speed per Unmounted

Name: Trappe
Description: Generates 1 gold per turn spent in mountains and forests.

Name: Hunting shot
Description: Deals 1 damage, get 1 food.  +1 food if enemy is an Animal.

Name: Track
Description: For your next exploration, observe until you find a living entity, ut the cards back in the same order on the top of the map, and explore.

Name: Assassination
Description: Kills the targeted unit.

Name: Poison dagger
Description: Attack with a venomous dagger.

Name: Carok
Description: Kill the selected adventurer. Put Carok in the Discovery pile of your opponent.

Name: Hostage taking
Description: Instead of defeating this enemy adventurer, you might keep it with 1 hp as a hostage. This hostage can be ransomed in any settlements for its hire cost.

Name: Enslave
Description: The targeted unit becomes a single-type slave.

Name: Covered action
Description: Deals 4 damage.

Name: Capture
Description: Capture the targeted unit. Captured unit joins the group and gain the Slave as an additional type.

Name: Nomadism
Description: Stopping costs you 1 fame per turn stopped. All your buidlings are mobile: they move with your group.

Name: Bribery
Description: For 1 gold, bribe the targeted Soldier, Noble or Outlaw, so instead of attacking you, he attacks the designated player.

Name: Robbery
Description: Steal the targeted item.

Name: Brazen conferral
Description: Steal a Quest, and add this quest to your group, regardless of your quest limit.

Name: Pillaging
Description: Pillage the targeted settlement. Steal everything the settlement has. Adventurers of that settlement become aggressive, they attack you!

Name: Animal breeding
Description: Search for an Animal in the Explored pile in exchange for 1 Animal from your group.

Name: Pastoralism
Description: With more than 2 herdable animals in your group, generates 1 food per turn.

Name: Horse culture
Description: Your horses also count as fame.

Name: Plains mastery
Description: +1 speed in plain per unit with Cavalry specialty or per unit with a mount.

Name: Razzia
Description: Deal 1 damage per unmounted adventurer in your group, and 2 per mounted adventurer.

Name: Guerilla
Description: +1 attack in Marshes and Forests regions.

Name: Defilement
Description: Target a Location. Generate X Gold, where X is the level of that Location.

Name: Steal resource
Description: Steal 1 resource per Outlaw adventurer in your group from the targeted settlement.

Name: Forced trade
Description: You can trade any of your resource at the targeted settlement.

Name: Tame
Description: Tame the animal to add it to the group.

Name: Uliger
Description: Gain +1 hand size whenever a Plain is discovered.

Name: Suicide attack
Description: Send the slave to attack the enemies. Roll 2 dices, deal that result as damage. The slave dies in the process.

Name: Piracy
Description: Each time you use an Outlaw skill, gain 1 fame.

Name: Raid
Description: Raid the enemy. Deal 1 damage per unit in your group, and steal 1 of their items, mounts, whatever.

Name: Shun
Description: Avoid the combat.

Name: Shanghaiing
Description: Kidnap the targeted adventurer, granting him the additional Slave type.

Name: Tiandihui
Description: +1 attack per Chinese in your group.

Name: Laotong
Description: Bond two female adventurers so they share all their attributes, talents, items, types, etc. When one of them dies, both dies.
